an10.111:1: Then a certain bhikkhu approached the Blessed One, paid homage to him, sat down to one side, and said:
an10.111:2: "It is said, Bhante, ‘one beyond training, one beyond training.’ In what way, Bhante, is a bhikkhu one beyond training?"[n.147]Asekha. A term for an arahant, who has completed the training in the noble eightfold path and thus possesses, beyond the eight path factors, right knowledge(sammāñāṇa)and right liberation(sammāvimutti).
